participant_abstract.sent: Different aspects of designing a remote control from user interface to technical details was presented.

participant_actions.sent: Prepare for the next presentation Thinking about usage of either infra red or radio waves, about LCD display and also including speech recognizer in the system.

participant_decisions.sent: Not include teletext in the remote control.
The remote control should be designed only for TV and not for DVD and other devices - The color and trade mark of the company should appear some how in the remote control shape and color.
- Volume and Channel change buttons should be designed in a way which is easy to use for the client.
It is better not to have lots of buttons on the remote control.
Sliding or rolling buttons should be used for the channel and volume buttons.
- Setting buttons and buttons related to complex functions should be hided by a cover or should be placed at the back side of the remote control

participant_problems.sent: We should yet think about the usage of infrared or radio waves, A clear decision was not made yet.
- We should yet decide about the usage of speech recognizer, the decision was not made yet.
